sen.e: Umetsugu INOUE (May 31, 1923 ~) is a Japanese film director, playwright and songwriter.

sen.e: He has a mantra that "a director must be able to calculate how much time and cost would take for filming one scene" and he has such a flexibility that soon he sought after possible scenes within the restricted budget and time when those originally expected were difficult.

His mantra is that 'a director must be able to calculate "how much time and expense is required in order to film a single scene,"' and he possesses the flexibility to pursue an achievable end result under the immediate circumstances in the event that it becomes apparent that it is impossible to attain the original vision due to time and budgetary constraints.
